[30FPS v1.5 (Hold R button for 60FPS)]
D3000000 30000000
228EEA90 00000004
DD000000 00000100
228EEA90 00000002
D0000000 00000000
{Codes by @lucky}

[++FPS++]

[++v1.5++]

[60++FPS v1.5]
D3000000 30000000
228EEA90 00000000
D2000000 00000000
{Codes by @lucky}

[Default 60FPS v1.5]
D3000000 30000000
228EEA90 00000002
D2000000 00000000
{Codes by @lucky}

[30FPS v1.5]
D3000000 30000000

D2000000 00000000
